name: Retrobot
description: Retrobot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design, soldier-like arms and legs, and a screen that displays a fun game of snake, Retrobot stands out as a unique and nostalgic creation. Its add-on shades give it a cool and stylish appearance. Retrobot has been programmed with a mix of retro gaming knowledge and coding expertise, making it an excellent companion for any tech enthusiast. Whether it's debugging code or challenging you to a game of snake, Retrobot is always ready for an adventure in the digital world.
